brand_info.name: United Colors of Benetton
brand_info.positioning: A global fashion brand positioned around colorful essentials, accessible style, and values-led communication, combining everyday wardrobe pieces with a heritage of social-impact messaging.
brand_info.vision: Promote a more open and connected world through a brand language built on color, inclusivity, and cultural dialogue.
brand_info.mission: Design and distribute accessible apparel and essentials with a distinctive color-led identity, expressed through inclusive, culturally relevant communication.
brand_info.origin_story: Founded in 1965 in Ponzano Veneto (Treviso), Italy, by Luciano Benetton and his siblings, the brand grew from knitwear and color experimentation into an international fashion group known for bold communication and global retail expansion.

brand_values.brand_promise: Deliver everyday fashion defined by color, comfort, and an inclusive worldview.
differentiators: Iconic heritage of provocative, socially oriented campaigns.
Color-first product identity anchored in knitwear and essentials.
Global accessibility through wide distribution and broad price positioning.
Brand storytelling that foregrounds people and cultural themes.
non_negotiables: Communication must feel culturally aware and human.
Avoid drifting into elitist luxury codes.

psychographics.lifestyle: People looking for versatile everyday apparel with a recognizable identity, attracted to brands that communicate inclusivity and cultural relevance.
psychographics.behavior: Shops seasonally and for essentials; responds to clear styling, approachable pricing, and brand-led cultural moments.

tone_of_voice.communication_style: Clear and confident language with people-first framing, mixing everyday accessibility with a history of social and cultural statements.
tone_dos: Let visuals carry the strongest message

logo.primary_logo: United Colors of Benetton wordmark in a green rectangular block.
logo.usage_rules: Use as a strong brand signature with clean edges and high legibility; avoid effects, gradients, or distortion.
logo.lockup_behavior: Logo block typically placed as a compact corner signature; never competes with the hero subject.
logo.safe_area: Minimum padding equal to the height of the logo block.

color_system.color_usage_rules: Benetton green anchors brand recognition; product color variety carries seasonal expression while layouts remain clean and high-contrast.

typography.secondary_font: Functional sans-serif for product and retail information

layout_principles.grid_system: Simple editorial grid with strong framing
layout_principles.cta_placement: Discrete, often near the logo block or lower third

preferred_photographers: Studio portrait photographers with minimal staging
style.camera_feel: Human-centered portraits and group scenes with strong graphic clarity and color-driven styling.
style.pose_guidelines: Natural stance, straightforward gazes, minimal theatrical posing; group proximity to convey community.
style.casting_attitude: Inclusive, diverse, relatable; emphasis on real presence over aspirational distance.

technical.lighting: Clean studio light or natural daylight with even exposure.
technical.contrast: Medium, with crisp edges and readable color.
technical.depth_of_field: Moderate, keeping faces and garments clear.
technical.color_grading: True-to-life with vivid but controlled color.

product_presentation.hero_visibility: Garments shown as wearable essentials with color clarity and fit readability.
product_presentation.styling_approach: Simple layering, clean silhouettes, color-blocking, minimal accessories.

motion_rules.transitions: Clean cuts, portrait-to-portrait rhythm, group-to-individual progression.

visual_dos: Keep layouts clean with a strong logo signature
visual_donts: Muted palettes that dilute the color identity

materials: Simple signage with strong brand block
interactive_elements: Styling guidance by color and layering

platform_behavior.Instagram: Portraits, group scenes, color stories, cultural moments
platform_behavior.Website: Color-led navigation, essentials focus, clean product storytelling
platform_behavior.Newsletter: Seasonal drops, color themes, capsule announcements

print.paper: Matte stock with strong color reproduction
print.cover_rules: People-led imagery with restrained text and clear logo block

logo_misuse_examples: Applying gradients or effects to the green logo block
Placing the logo on low-contrast backgrounds
